DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether inhalation aerosolize amphoterin B 10mg/d effective aerosolize amphoterin B 2mg/d reduce incidence invasive pulmonary aspergillosis .
DOC.brief_title: Value Amphotericin B Inhalation Prophylaxis Invasive Pulmonary Aspergillosis After Renal Transplantation
DOC.criteria: 65ys≥age≥18ys renal transplant recipient subject hypersensitivity amphotericin B receipt inhalational intravenous amphotericin B within last 30 day subject know invasive fungal infection renal transplant subject pneumonia
